title: Sample Schema
description: Metadata schema for samples at NSLS-II

research_group.description: The research group from the home facility that the user belongs to.

lead_experimenter.description: The primary user that will be present at the beamline for this experiment.

sample_maker.description: The maker of the sample being tested.

preparation_start_date.description: The date the sample preparation began.

cif_url.description: The URL to the crystallographic information of the sample.

cif_database_id.description: The database ID for the crystallographic information from the CIF database.

chemical_formula.description: Chemical formula(s), if known, of the sample component(s).

chemical_name_common.description: Common name(s), if any, of the sample component(s).

chemical_name_mineral.description: Mineral name(s), if any, of the sample component(s).

phase_state.description: The phase state(s), such as powder or solution, that the sample component is in.

tags.description: Users may enter in tags for personal use.

in_beam_container.description: Container items that are intended to be within the range of the beam.

dimensions.description: The relevant dimensions of the container.

chemical_formula.description: Chemical formula(s), if known, of the container component(s).

chemical_name_common.description: Common name(s), if any, of the container component(s).

chemical_name_mineral.description: Mineral name(s), if any, of the container component(s).

sample_dilutant.description: The name of the sample dilutant, if any are present.

out_of_beam_container.description: Container items that are intended to be outside the range of the beam.

dimensions.description: The relevant dimensions of the container.

chemical_formula.description: Chemical formula(s), if known, of the container component(s).

chemical_name_common.description: Common name(s), if any, of the container component(s).

chemical_name_mineral.description: Mineral name(s), if any, of the container component(s).

sample_dilutant.description: The name of the sample dilutant, if any are present.
